text: Litta Soheila Sohi (in ) (born April 8, 1966), is an Iranian dressage rider. She first tried riding at age four in Iran. At age nine she began attending riding classes in Denmark, and she started training in dressage in 2002 in Rome, Italy. She started riding professionally in 2002. She is the first dressage rider to represent Iran in international dressage competitions, doing so at Hickstead Equestrian Centre in 2014, as recorded on the FEI. She also competed in CDI3 Intermediate 1 and CDI3 Prix St-Gorges at Saumur in September 2014. Litta is a member of British Dressage. She competed in Equestrian at the 2018 Asian Games and finished in 6th place. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Iranian female equestrians Category:Iranian dressage riders Category:Equestrians at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for Iran Category:1966 births
title: Litta Soheila Sohi
